title: The Herd-HOUR-1-NBA playoffs, Bill Belichick
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-NBA playoffs, Bill Belichick
description:
Colin talks about the Lakers losing to the Blazers, the Bucks losing to the Magic, and why he believes Bill Belichick has the sports media fooled.


Guest: Nick Wright

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
